Html:
Thank you for your contributions to the community. I find this tool very useful. Also, I recommended this tool as a workaround for a .NET framework "bug" that I posted here:

https://connect.microsoft.com/VisualStudio/feedback/details/713439/system-configuration-possible-bug-in-the-framework-creating-a-custom-config-and-using-xsd-exe-to-generate-an-xsd

And Here:

http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/clr/thread/98339219-2b65-4230-9f61-3e86e5d1926d/

Keep up the good work!

Regards,

Ryan Shaw
